title: Semantic UI Responsive Homepage - Fixed
summary: What a shame! Semantic UI does not support a responsive menu out of the box. They provide a 'hack', but I don't like it. Because there are two sets of layout containers: one for desktop and the other for mobile, you have to detect the device before rendering with the correct layout, which causes a redundant code, and is especially hard if you use SSR like nextJS. Also, their example code does not work well when reloading in the mobile device because it does not do the real device detection on SSR. This demo intends to fix that.
